title: Secure and Manage
description:
Ideally governance, security, and operations have each been factored into the operating model for your cloud environments. If they have not, take a moment to validate security and management constraints for this asset.
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/secure-and-manage
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/secure-and-manage/
